resources.string: Where do you want to sit?
How many seats are you requesting?
the number of guests must be greater than 0
please call 123–456–7890 to make a reservation for parties larger than 6
Enter a number of guests between 1 and 6. \n Click the SUBMIT button. \n Choose your booth (or table if less than 5 guests).
This app is used to reserve a table
